title: Dayton Aviation Heritage National Historical Park: Park Fun
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Park Fun              Park Fun         Young pilots launch their paper airplanes at the park. NPS Photo  Paper Airplanes   Paper airplanes can be a simple toy to some or an aeronautics research tool to others. Paper airplanes can be folded into shapes like basic darts and gliders, to high-tech planes.   Did you know that paper airplanes use the same principles of flight as airplanes and that paper airplanes are used to study aerodynamics by scientists, engineers and students?   There are many paper airplane models to make. You can make your own design or you can make The BAT.  Safe Flying!          Make Your Own KITE!   The Wright brothers used kites to figure out how to roll an aircraft.  Now, you can make your very own homemade kite to fly around your yard.      A
